full_summary:
## Geomatics and Telecommunications Systems Specialists
### Request for Proposal (RFP)
#### Reference Number
*cb-7391-43196863*

**Issued By:** Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED)

**Publication Date**: July 21, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: August 21, 2023, at 14:00:00 ET

**The Purpose**
ISED is seeking experienced professionals to provide the following services:

I. Telecommunications Systems Specialist
	* Technical assessment of telecommunications networks
	* Identification of areas for improvement and recommendations
	* Data analysis and reports preparation
	* Negotiation of Statements of Work (SOW) for implementing broadband services

II. Geomatics Specialist
	* Geographic analysis and data processing
	* Document preparation and data storage management
	* Review and analysis of GIS and/or related datasets

**Eligibility**
The bidding process is open to all qualified contractors, including those with expertise in geographic information systems (GIS).

**Requirements**
The bidding process includes a notice to proceed, followed by a statement of work (SOW).

**Evaluation and Selection Criteria**
Respondents will be evaluated based on:

* Technical merit
* Price
* Ability to meet the SOW

**Notice and Attachments**
A copy of the notice and attachment can be found on the Canadabuy.ca website.

**Point of Contact**
For any questions or concerns, please contact:
Davis Opie
ISED
Davis.opie@ised-isde.gc.ca
(613) 324-9165

### Important Notices and Attachments
* Please access the online bid link: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7391/ised207726---npp.pdf>, and <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7391/ised207726---attachment-2-to-part-1---list-of-suppliers.pdf>

### Corresponding Regions
This project falls within the National Capital Region (NCR) and is subject to Canadian trade agreements, including CPTPP, CFTA, NAFTA, CETA, CUFTA, CCFTA, Canada-Colombia FTA, CPFTA, CKFTA, and WTO GPA.

### Trade Agreements
ISED expects bidders to be compliant with the respective trade agreements.

### Contract and Performance
Delivery of services is expected to start on September 1, 2023,
